DOC.brief_summary: The aim study report subjective objective outcome outside-in transobturator technique ( TOT ) ( MonarcÂ® ) long-term follow-up . This follow-up study concern 191 patient operate Turku University Hospital May 2003 December 2004 use TOT . SUI diagnose positive stress test , Urinary Incontinence Severity Score ( UISS ) Detrusor Instability Score ( DIS ) . After mean 6.5 year evaluation include gynecological examination supine stress test . Subjective outcome evaluate UISS , DIS , visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , questionnaire subjective evaluation continence , EuroQoL-5D , EQ-5D VAS short version IIQ-7 UDI-6 . Objective cure define negative stress test absence reoperation SUI follow-up period .
DOC.brief_title: The Outcome Transobturator Tape ( TOT ) Procedure
DOC.criteria: 191 patient operate TOT procedure May 2003 December 2004 Department Obstetrics Gynecology Turku University Hospital .
